LanguageData.FF_AntidepressantProduction.label: antidepressant production
LanguageData.FF_AntidepressantProduction.description: Produce antidepressant, a mildly euphoric drug which is used to counteract depression.
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerProduction.label: painkiller production
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerProduction.description: Produce painkiller, an analgesic drug which provides a relief from pain. Useful for pawns who have painful scars.
LanguageData.FF_ScytheProduction.label: scythe production
LanguageData.FF_ScytheProduction.description: Produce scythe, an immunostimulant drug which drastically boosts the user's immune system at the cost of inducing a temporary coma.
LanguageData.FF_OverclockProduction.label: overclock production
LanguageData.FF_OverclockProduction.description: Produce overclock, a self-injected drug cocktail which boosts the metabolism into overdrive, augmenting movement and productivity while wearing down the body's energy reserves.
LanguageData.FF_EctostasisProduction.label: ectostasis production
LanguageData.FF_EctostasisProduction.description: Produce ectostasis, a homeostatic drug which uses mechanites to provide relief from internal conditions.
LanguageData.FF_SorrowProduction.label: sorrow production
LanguageData.FF_SorrowProduction.description: Produce sorrow, a depressant drug which is used to induce a state of cathartic sadness.
LanguageData.FF_FibrodustProduction.label: fibrodust production
LanguageData.FF_FibrodustProduction.description: Produce fibrodust, a coagulant drug which staunches bleeding temporarily, but may cause cardiovascular issues.
LanguageData.FF_NeodermProduction.label: neoderm production
LanguageData.FF_NeodermProduction.description: Produce neoderm, a regenerative ointment which painfully heals dermal scars over time.
